description: The first time Meriesa modeled for us I wasn't very impressed, she didn't seem to be getting off on our toys (even though the night before she was off the hook). So when she called asking if she could get fucked by the machines again, I was really hesitant. But then she explained what happened the first time, so I gave her another chance. OK, so she's redeemed herself.
title: Meriesa
